title: Foggy city street driving with 7 braking events
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a foggy city street with multiple braking events.

description: The blue car is driving slowly on a foggy city street with multiple traffic lights and other cars. The road is wet and visibility is low due to the fog. The traffic lights are green, allowing the blue car to continue driving.
reasoning: The blue car is driving slowly to maintain a safe distance from other vehicles on the foggy city street.
